DOC.brief_summary: Recent study show narrow-band imaging ( NBI ) powerful diagnostic tool differentiation neoplastic non-neoplastic colorectal polyp . The aim present study develop evaluate computer-based method automate classification small colorectal polyps basis vascularization features.In prospective study 207 polyp size 10mm small detect zoom NBI colonoscopy . These polyp image subsequently remove histological analysis . polyp image analyze computer algorithm . The propose computer-based method consist several step : preprocessing , vessel segmentation , feature extraction classification . The result automatic classification ( sensitivity , specificity , negative predictive value , positive predictive value accuracy ) compare human observer , blind histological gold standard .
